member.name: T:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.ExternalDocumentation
member.summary: Configures external documentation.

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.ExternalDocumentation.Namespace
member.summary: The namespace to configure.

member.name: T:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownGenerator
member.summary: Generates Markdown from .NET XML documentation comments.

member.name: M:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownGenerator.Generate(System.String,System.String,XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownSettings)
member.summary: Generates Markdown from .NET XML documentation comments.
member.returns: The names of files that were added, changed, or removed.

member.name: T:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownResult
member.summary: The names of files that were added, changed, or removed.

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownResult.Added
member.summary: The names of files that were added.

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownResult.Changed
member.summary: The names of files that were changed.

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownResult.Removed
member.summary: The names of files that were removed.

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownResult.Messages
member.summary: Messages that should be displayed (unless quiet).

member.name: T:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownSettings
member.summary: Settings for markdown generation.

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownSettings.SourceCodePath
member.summary: The URL of the folder containing the source code of the assembly, e.g. at GitHub.
member.remarks: The URL may be absolute or relative. Required to generate source code links in the See Also sections for types.

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownSettings.RootNamespace
member.summary: The root namespace of the input assembly.
member.remarks: Used to generate source code links in the See Also sections for types. If omitted, the tool guesses the root namespace from the exported types.

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownSettings.IncludeObsolete
member.summary: If true, generates documentation for obsolete types and members. (Default false.)

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownSettings.VisibilityLevel
member.summary: The minimum visibility for documented types and members.

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownSettings.NewLine
member.summary: Indicates the newline used in the output.
member.remarks: Defaults to "\r\n" or "\n", depending on the platform.

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownSettings.ShouldClean
member.summary: If true, deletes previously generated files that are no longer used.

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownSettings.IsQuiet
member.summary: If true, suppresses normal console output.

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownSettings.IsDryRun
member.summary: If true, executes without making changes to the file system.

member.name: P:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocMarkdownSettings.ExternalDocs
member.summary: Configures external documentation.

member.name: T:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocVisibilityLevel
member.summary: The minimum visibility for documented types and members.

member.name: F:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocVisibilityLevel.Private
member.summary: All types and members are documented.

member.name: F:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocVisibilityLevel.Internal
member.summary: Only public, protected, and internal types and members are documented.

member.name: F:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocVisibilityLevel.Protected
member.summary: Only public and protected types and members are documented.

member.name: F:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocVisibilityLevel.ProtectedInternal
member.summary: Reserved for internal use.

member.name: F:XmlDocMarkdown.Core.XmlDocVisibilityLevel.Public
member.summary: Only public types and members are documented.
